name: Galarian Mr. Mime
description: Its talent is tap-dancing. It can also manipulate temperatures to create a floor of ice, which this Pokémon can kick up to use as a barrier.

attacks.name: Icy Wind
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Triple Spin
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.
